name: 1tank100fish
title: 1 Tank 100 Fish
author: LuziferSenpai
description: This MOD is a joke to the FFF-187, where they sayed: Of course we also added support for mods, so you can define what do you get from sending a rocket, and depending on what you put in the rocket - say, if you put a tank into the rocket, you receive 100 raw fish, because that would make perfect sense.
